arts.ttl: ‘Wonderful player’ – West Brom man hailed by Tony Mowbray after Burnley draw
arts.sum: West Brom boss Tony Mowbray has labelled John Swift as a ‘wonderful player’ after their draw at Burnley.… The post ‘Wonderful player’ – West Brom man hailed by Tony Mowbray after Burnley draw appeared first on The72 - Football League News.

arts.ttl: Burnley player ratings vs West Brom as two 8/10s and two 5/10s dished out after frustrating draw - gallery
arts.sum: Burnley missed out on the chance to move into top spot in the Championship last night after playing out a frustrating draw with West Brom.

arts.ttl: Mike Jackson clears up Burnley v West Brom full-time drama as Clarets make appeal decision
arts.sum: Burnley are expected to lodge an appeal against the red card shown to CJ Egan-Riley at full-time during their draw against West Brom.

arts.ttl: Burnley frustrated in heated draw as Parker, Egan-Riley sent off at full-time
arts.sum: Scott Parker and CJ Egan-Riley were sent off after the final whistle as Burnley missed the chance to go top of the Championship, held to a 1-1 draw by play-off chasing West Brom.

arts.ttl: Scott Parker and CJ Egan-Riley see red after final whistle as Burnley held
arts.sum: John Swift’s free-kick for West Brom ended Burnley’s run of seven consecutive home clean sheets.

arts.ttl: Burnley 1-1 West Brom: Clarets miss out on the opportunity to move into the top two
arts.sum: Burnley’s promotion charge stalled after playing out a frustrating draw with play-off chasing West Brom.

arts.ttl: Burnley v West Brom confirmed XIs and team news as Lyle Foster dropped despite return to scoring ways
arts.sum: Lyle Foster has been dropped to the bench for Burnley despite breaking his scoring duck against Luton Town on Saturday.

arts.ttl: Burnley Football Club pitch invader given three-year football banning order
arts.sum: A man has been given a three-year football banning order after entering the pitch during Burnley fixture with Middlesbrough in December.

arts.ttl: 'Not going to be defining': Tony Mowbray makes West Brom 'free hit' claim ahead of Burnley clash
arts.sum: Tony Mowbray has described West Brom’s clash against Burnley tonight as a “free hit” for his side.

arts.ttl: Scott Parker delivers Burnley promotion verdict ahead of West Brom clash as Leeds United slip
arts.sum: Scott Parker has pledged his Burnley side will keep their “foot down on the pedal” as they enter the decisive final stage of the promotion run-in.
